d:entry.p: ORIGIN French, from thé 'tea', based on Chinese 茶 (chá) 'tea'
DECLENSION Based on Greek noun forms ending in 'ē'

ol.li: to name, designate : eum amicum voco — I call him a friend.
to to bring or put into a state or condition : vocare in dubium — to call into question.
